personal.name: Guy Hania
personal.title: Software developer, problem solver, and coffee enthusiast
personal.description: I'm Guy, a developer with a passion for building thoughtful, reliable applications. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating clean, scalable solutions that make a difference.
about: I'm a passionate software developer with a strong focus on creating clean, efficient, and user-friendly applications. With experience in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning them into simple, beautiful solutions.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or enjoying a good cup of coffee while reading tech blogs.
